name: anc2r
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))

stmt.origin: a2i(w0, wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, wa(w2, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wa(w2, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wa(w2, w0)))
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w2, w0))))

comment: Conjoin antecedent to right of consequent in nested implication. (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-1994.)
